mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(midx, noticeSubject, noticeCategory, noticeArticle, noticeFileName, noticeFilePath, noticeHashtag) VALUES(#{midx}, #{noticeSubject}, #{noticeCategory}, #{noticeArticle}, #{noticeUploadedFileName}, #{noticeFilePath}, #{noticeHashtag})
mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from notice where noticeYN="N"
mapper.update: update notice set noticeCategory = #{noticeCategory}, noticeSubject = #{noticeSubject}, noticeArticle = #{noticeArticle}, noticeHashtag = #{noticeHashtag} where nidx=#{nidx}
update notice set noticeYN = 'Y' , noticeWriteday = now() where nidx=#{nidx}
